issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description: If you have an xml file in the assets folder and compile the app on android, you are unable to find the file with Ti.Filesystem APIs. iOS is unaffected. if you rename the xml file to a different extension. say .lmx android can suddenly read the file in the assets directory.
fields.summary: Alloy XML files in assets folder on android get processed and can't be found

comments.body: [~sophrinix] can you please attach a test case and steps to reproduce?
